title: US COVID cases and deaths by states over time
tool_name: US COVID cases and deaths by states over time

api_list.name: Get COVID cases and deaths by state
api_list.description: Get COVID cases and deaths by state
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://us-covid-cases-and-deaths-by-states-over-time.p.rapidapi.com/qSSRFV/us_covid_cases_and_deaths_by_state_/1"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "us-covid-cases-and-deaths-by-states-over-time.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
